string.description: name of the Export
resource content will be returned as it was at the time of this git hash

list.description: An optional set of fields to be exposed by this export.

string.description: The field name to add as a label
The state DB path to export, in the format '.node.srl.interface'
A regular expression to be applied to the field value.
A regular expression replacement to be applied to the field value.

list_nested.description:
DynamicLabels defines a list of dynamic labels to add to the metrics.
The only supported dynamic source is a path+field from SA.
The regex and replacement are used to extract the Label value from SA response.

string.description: Label name.
Label value.

list_nested.description:
StaticLabels defines a list of static labels and values to
be added to the default labels of the generated metric.

single_nested.description:
Labels allows to add labels to the generated metrics,
either statically (predefined set of label/value) or
dynamically based on a path+field
retrieved from EDB.

string.description:
Destination defines the new value.
It can be a regular expression with replacement groups.
Its data type must be convertible to a float64.

Source defines the value to be mapped.
It can be a regular expression with capture groups.

list_nested.description:
Mappings are a set of rules used to map metrics values to values
that can be ingested by Prometheus, e.g: DOWN->1, UP->2

string.description: A regular expression to be applied to the metric name
A regular expression replacement to be applied to the metric name

single_nested.description: metric name renaming regex and replacement

string.description: The state DB path to export, in the format '.namespace.node.srl.interface'
An optional prefix to add to all metrics exposed by this export, for example 'interface'
The CR group such as `core.eda.nokia.com`.
The CR kind such as `toponode`.

list.description:
List of labels to include with the metric.
Include all if not set.

string.description:
CR name to be queried.
Get all of not set.
The CR namespace, it defaults to all if not specified.
The CR version such as `v1` or `v1alpha1`.

single_nested.description:
A Custom resource to be used as a source for the metric.
It will generate a metric with the CR labels and a value of 1.

string.description: A where clause to use for the query, e.g. 'oper-state = down'. You can omit enclosing parentheses.

list_nested.description: Exports is the list of metrics and their sources to be exposed to Prometheus

string.description: Metric group, defines the collector the metrics belong to.

single_nested.description: ExportSpec defines the desired state of Export
ExportStatus defines the observed state of Export

string.description: a comma-separated list of resource fields to fetch/return.  If unspecified, all fields are fetched.  If empty, only key-fields are fetched.
an EQL "where" expression that will be used to filter the set of resources returned.
a label selector string to filter the results based on CR labels

list.description: An optional set of fields to be exposed by this export.

string.description: The field name to add as a label
The state DB path to export, in the format '.node.srl.interface'
A regular expression to be applied to the field value.
A regular expression replacement to be applied to the field value.
